Detailed Description

This class is the base class for all consoles.

Member Function Documentation

void ConsoleManager::activate ( const char *  label  ) 

This method activates the console with the associated label.

void ConsoleManager::activate ( XConsole *  pConsole  ) 

This method sets the current active console.

void ConsoleManager::add ( XConsole *  pConsole,
const char *  label,
KeyCode::Key  key = KeyCode::KEY_NONE,
uint32  modifiers = 0 
)

This method adds a console to be managed.

The console manager owns the input console and is responsible for deleting it.

Parameters:
pConsole The console to be managed.
label The label to associate with the console.
key The keyboard key to associate with the console.
modifiers The modifiers that must be pressed with 'key'.

const std::string & ConsoleManager::consoleName ( XConsole *  console  )  const

Given a console, this determines the name of that console.

Returns "" if not found.

XConsole * ConsoleManager::pActiveConsole (  )  const

This method returns the current active console.

If no console is active, NULL is returned.
